project_abstract.cdata: The proposed loan would help to meet the foreign exchange cost of rehabilitating the Lagos-Ilorin and Lagos-Ewekoro roads and the services of consultants for supervision, for detailed engineering of a new Lagos-Ibadan road and for feasibility studies.
